languages.text: "Символ веры, что сияет сквозь дыхание Имматериума — благой знак. Я буду носить его".

traits.locale_text: "Символ веры, что сияет сквозь дыхание Имматериума, — определенно благой знак. Я бы охотно носил{mf||а} такой".

languages.text: "A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."
languages.original_text: "Символ веры, что сияет сквозь дыхание Имматериума — благой знак. Я буду носить его".

traits.locale_text: "A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."
"A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."
"A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."
"A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."
"A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."
"A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."

languages.text: «Un símbolo de la fe capaz de brillar a través de la bruma del inmaterio es un buen presagio. Me lo voy a poner».
languages.original_text: "A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."

traits.locale_text: «Un símbolo de la fe capaz de brillar a través de la bruma del inmaterio es un buen presagio. Me lo voy a poner».

languages.text: 「非物質世界の息吹の中で輝く信仰の象徴は、吉兆である。私が身につけよう」
languages.original_text: "A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."

traits.locale_text: 「非物質世界の息吹の中で輝く信仰の象徴は、吉兆である。私が身につけよう」

languages.text: “信仰的印记刺穿了亚空间的气息，闪耀着明亮的光芒。这是个好兆头，我要戴上这个坠饰。”
languages.original_text: "A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."

traits.locale_text: “信仰的印记刺穿了亚空间的气息，闪耀着明亮的光芒。这是个好兆头，我要戴上这个坠饰。”

languages.text: "Ein Symbol des Glaubens, das im Odem des Immateriums schimmert, ist ein gutes Omen. Ich werde es tragen."
languages.original_text: "A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Symbol des Glaubens, das im Odem des Immateriums schimmert, ist ein gutes Omen. Ich werde es tragen."

languages.text: « Un symbole de foi brillant à travers le souffle de l'Immaterium ne peut être que de bon augure. Je le porterai avec fierté. »
languages.original_text: "A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."

traits.locale_text: « Un symbole de foi brillant à travers le souffle de l'Immaterium ne peut être que de bon augure. Je le porterai avec fierté. »

languages.text: "Tindiyar'ın nefesi boyunca parıldayan bir inanç sembolü, iyiye alamettir. Onu takacağım."
languages.original_text: "A symbol of faith shining through the breath of the Immaterium is a good omen. I shall wear it."
